name: OSSystemExtensionManager
desc: A type that facilitates activation and deactivation of system extensions.

items.name: class var shared: OSSystemExtensionManager
items.desc: The shared instance of the extension manager.

items.name: func submitRequest(OSSystemExtensionRequest)
items.desc: Submits a system extension request to the manager.

items.name: class OSSystemExtensionRequest
items.desc: A request to activate or deactivate a system extension.
